events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position; our team will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further consideration by our developers team.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the recruitment process.
We completed an initial screening call to discuss your background and coding experience relevant to this engineering role.
Thank you for your prompt response and providing additional details about your previous software development projects.
Your technical interview with our lead engineer has been scheduled for May 10th at 14:00 UTC.
The technical interview was completed successfully, and the interviewers were impressed with your coding skills and problem-solving approach.
We have arranged an HR interview to discuss company culture, benefits, and your expectations from this engineering role.
Your HR interview went well, and the team appreciated your enthusiasm and alignment with company values.
We are pleased to propose you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about joining our engineering team.
You accepted our job offer officially and are scheduled to begin onboarding next week.
Your onboarding process started smoothly, including account setups, introductions to the engineering team, and initial training.
The hiring process has been officially closed with you joining the engineering department as a full-time Software Engineer.
